Question: This person had nothing to do with "Myra", which treated spiritualism as real, something of which he never would have approved.
Hints: This person continued to perform the escape until his death in 1926.
This person's brother, Theodore Hardeen, continued to perform the milk can (and the wooden chest variation) into the 1940s.
The mahogany and metal cell featured a glass front, through which audiences could clearly see this person.
